original_solution_mapping.L1: Since Agate has 30 precious stones and Olivine has 5 more precious stones, then Olivine has 30+5 = <<30+5=35>>35 precious stones.
original_solution_mapping.L2: The total number of stones Olivine and Agate has is 35+30 = <<35+30=65>>65
original_solution_mapping.L3: Diamond has 11 more precious stones than Olivine, who has 35 stones, meaning Diamond has 35+11= <<11+35=46>>46 precious stones
original_solution_mapping.L4: In total, they all have 65+46 = <<65+46=111>>111 precious stones.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2557.
    Returns: the total number of precious stones they have together.
    """
    # L1
    agate_stones = 30 # agate has 30 precious stones
    olivine_more_than_agate = 5 # Olivine has 5 more precious stones than agate
    olivine_stones = agate_stones + olivine_more_than_agate

    # L2
    olivine_agate_total = olivine_stones + agate_stones

    # L3
    diamond_more_than_olivine = 11 # diamond has 11 more precious stones than olivine
    diamond_stones = olivine_stones + diamond_more_than_olivine

    # L4
    total_stones = olivine_agate_total + diamond_stones

    # FA
    answer = total_stones
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Since Agate has {agate_stones} precious stones and Olivine has {olivine_more_than_agate} more precious stones, then Olivine has {agate_stones}+{olivine_more_than_agate} = <<{agate_stones}+{olivine_more_than_agate}={olivine_stones}>>{olivine_stones} precious stones.
The total number of stones Olivine and Agate has is {olivine_stones}+{agate_stones} = <<{olivine_stones}+{agate_stones}={olivine_agate_total}>>{olivine_agate_total}

Diamond has {diamond_more_than_olivine} more precious stones than Olivine, who has {olivine_stones} stones, meaning Diamond has {olivine_stones}+{diamond_more_than_olivine}= <<{diamond_more_than_olivine}+{olivine_stones}={diamond_stones}>>{diamond_stones} precious stones
In total, they all have {olivine_agate_total}+{diamond_stones} = <<{olivine_agate_total}+{diamond_stones}={total_stones}>>{total_stones} precious stones.
